text: Caulospongia is a genus of sea sponges belonging to the family Suberitidae. == Species == The following species are recognised in the genus Caulospongia: *Caulospongia amplexa Fromont, 1998 *Caulospongia biflabellata Fromont, 1998 *Caulospongia elegans (Lendenfeld 1888) *Caulospongia pennatula (Lamarck 1814) *Caulospongia perfoliata (Lamarck 1814) *Caulospongia plicata Kent, 1871 *Caulospongia reticulata Fromont, 1998 *Caulospongia venosa Fromont, 1998 == References == Category:Suberitidae Category:Sponge genera
title: Caulospongia
